title: Lag Spikes for more than 2 weeks.
body:
Hi everyone,

I am having lag spike in every games for more than 2 weeks already. My ingame ping is very weird. It slowly comes down to 30 then suddenly go high op tu 170-190. Sometimes it makes me dc from the game, especially when I am in team combat. I tried to turn off my modem and turn it on after 1 min. I turn off my anti-virus and fire wall. None of those method would help me to solve the problem. I called my network provider which is Optus this morning and they confirmed that my connection is perfectly fine. So can you guys suggest me any other method I can try to fix this problem?

Thanks,

replies.body:
Hi guys, 

Ive been having the exact same issue. All symptoms; It started about 3 weeks ago (was running smooth on 30 ping for like 2 years now), intermittent spikes every few seconds to 180-200 ping and  I am also with Optus (possibly unrelated). I have been getting notable performance boost in non peak hours, midnight etc. 
I would really appreciate any help as playing atm with a 1-2 second delay is pretty much unplayable. (Try not feeding when playing against a bursty assassin like Zed, LB and the like.)
Ill also run the log diagnostics and send it off.  My OS is Windows7 Horse.

Windows7 Horse sounds like an amazing fork of Windows 7, though I am unfortunately unfamiliar with it.

Presuming that it uses the same base configuration tools as the standard, have you tried flushing your DNS, renewing your IP and resetting all devices on your network?

P.S. Use "Reply" to reply to me so that I get notification.

Do you have any other applications open while running League?

Do you have any applications which are set to automatically update?

What OS are you on?

Hello Fictus Smile,

Run this here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/tools/network-logs

Send the results to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

I'll take a look and get back to you, it would also be helpful to know where you are connecting from.
I have already sent you my report. Hope to hear from you guys soon. thanks
